descriptionHtml:
While i was playing Skyrim i came across a little bug that caused my character to have both the ebony sword and Mehrune's razur equipped and i was like "hey, that doesn't look so bad", so i decided to make this mod.

The end of my (boring) little story.

Anyway, you can download a replacer version or a standalone version, stats are identical but the standalone requires a daedra heart.

[b]Check my other mods[/b]
-"1-handed" series

author: vatakc
